12.content:
The question of whether you had shrunk or the world around you is simply big passes your mind, but then you realize that it makes little difference. You are small and pretty certain that there are creatures out here that would gladly add you to their lunch. Standing around waiting for something to find you is definitely not a good idea so you make your way through the massive undergrowth and even bigger trees within whose shadows you hide. Progress is slow and you can only hope to find something to help you in your current situation. That is when you hear a sudden grunt from nearby.

Making your way towards the sound, you emerge from the brushes into a clearing where a massive three-horned creature is laying on its stomach, rubbing its beak against the ground. Through its expression and its troubled grunting you understand it to be in pain. For a moment you watch as the beast continues to writhe in pain until it gives up in exhaustion and releases a distressful cry. That is when it notices you watching it from the edge of the undergrowth and turns to you with a pleading expression.

"Human... help me... please," it begs.

You are dumbstruck by its speech and remain still, unsure of what to do. The creature lets out another cry, this time aimed at you. What did this creature want? Should you approach it?
12.title: Great Three Horn

121.content:
Cautiously you approach the massive beast. Despite all your instincts insisting that you run, the triceratops' distress keeps you from turning tail. As you get close you see small amount of blood dripping off of the creature's nose, staining the dirt by your feet. The triceratops looks at your pleadingly and presents to you the side of its nose where you find a gruesome sight. Just near the nostril is a massive tooth lodged into the flesh with trickles of blood squeezing from in between. The wound did not look serious, merely a glance, but the thing was nonetheless uncomfortably wedged in the creature's hide.

"Please human... help me remove it," the triceratops whimpers and moves its massive snout close enough for you to get a hold of the tooth.

Without further delay you grab a hold of the tooth and yank. The triceratops grunts in pain as the tooth loosens slightly, but not enough to remove it. An idea pops in your head and you ask the triceratops to pull its head back while you hold on tight. You then brace yourself and give the creature a go ahead. The triceratops yanks with enough force to send you flying, but the slight moment of resistance your hold offers dislodges the tooth from flesh and you instead topple over on your back with the weight of the tooth pinning you to the ground.

As you helplessly attempt to free yourself from under the tooth you hear the triceratops sigh in relief and the ground shakes as it takes a few steps in an unknown direction. This leads you to panic as you fear you will not be able to free yourself without help and the triceratops is your only hope in the current situation.
121.title: Helping Out

1212.content:
You squirm rigorously to free yourself from under the tooth, but your attempts are futile. Just then a great shadow looms over you and you suddenly find yourself looking up at the face of the triceratops you had just assisted. With a light nudge it pushes the tooth off of your body and you gasp in air as you lungs are no longer constricted by the object's weight. While you recover the triceratops eyes you curiously.

"Thank you," you manage to say with a strained voice. The thought of talking to an animal, an extinct one at that, was among the last of your concerns right now.

"It is I who should be grateful, little human," the triceratops replies, "Had you not come along this wound would have likely infected."

The creature shows you its wound which did not look that bad, but bled slightly. A droplet of blood runs down its nose and splashes on your face. You spatter as you try to keep the stuff out of your mouth.

"My sincere apologies, my friend," the triceratops says with an embarrassed tone and leans in close, "Allow me."

Before you understand what the creature means its tongue shoots out and licks your face clean of the red substance.

"Thank you, I suppose," you say now spitting out warm saliva. Getting up on your feet, you dust your clothes off as the triceratops looks at you with what you assume is its equivalent of a human smile.

"This is quite extraordinary," it giggles, "I am actually having a conversation with a human."

"I am the one talking to a dinosaur," you reply,"You are supposed to be extinct."

The triceratops gives you a confused expression.

"What ever do you mean? It is you humans that are so rare that you might as well be considered extinct."

"I am not even from this wo...," you are about to say, but quickly cut yourself off. It just occurred to you that this creature knew what you are. That meant...

"You have seen my kind before?"

"Not me, no," the triceratops explains, "But everyone knows the stories. They say you creatures bring good fortune with you. Though accounts on your size do vary. The last human I heard of was far bigger than you, little one."

"And do you know where this other human resides?" you enquire.

"Oh, this human was killed off some time ago. Got torn to shreds by a tyrannosaurus. Almost happened to me too. Let down my guard and BAM! Had one of those ugly giants on top of me. But you do not mess with a mighty three-horn without getting hurt."

The triceratops emphasizes this by displaying a strong thrust with its great horns.

"It is a dangerous world out here. That said, where are you headed? It is quite dangerous for little creatures like you to be wandering about alone. I would be greatly honoured if you joined me for an evening meal at my home. It is not everyday one is granted the privilege to enjoy human company."

"Well, I... you see...," you mutter, looking for an excuse not to go, but none pops in your head. In all honesty, you were a bit concerned about being too close to any creature the size of a cruise ship to you. Then again, the triceratops was right about the dangers of being alone out here.
1212.title: A Friend in a Strange World

12121.content:
"Very well," you reply, "I admit I am lost out here and quite curious to experience your hospitality."

The triceratops gives you a gleeful expression.

"I promise you will not regret this. My guests are always offered special treatment and I will not hold you an exception."

"I am very eager to find out, Mr... Mrs...?"

"Oh, how rude of me not to introduce myself. I am Tricia - and it is missus. But please, no formalities are required."

"Well, my name is __________," you say, "It is a pleasure to meet you."

"Likewise," Tricia replies, "Now, my home is a small distance from here so I must ask your permission to carry you there. It is nothing personal, just that it will take far too long for your little feet to reach there."

"I suppose we can do that, but how were you exactly planning to..."

Before you can finish your question, she nudges you around and clamps her teeth on the collar of your shirt. You are lifted off the ground to a height far greater than you were comfortable with, but your requests for a more appealing way of travel were ignored by the triceratops. She begins the journey home, taking ground shaking steps and letting you swing with the motion of her walk. The occasional leaf or branch from low growing bushes brush you by, but Tricia's hold on you was far too determined to let you fall. It was obvious that this triceratops was not going to let you go until she had been allowed the chance to host an evening for you.


Time passes by and eventually the two of you reach a forest hut that to even at your normal size would have seemed big. Of course, for Tricia whose size requires far more space, the construction is nothing special. The inside is very simple, just one big room, but it is well decorated with ornaments, tapestries and anything else that make a home cosy. The air is a bit stuffy and there is a distinct smell of triceratops, however, the feeling is rather pleasant as you realize it to have been quite chilly outside. Your ride comes to an end as Tricia lowers you on top of a pile of warm furs that you assumed acted as a bed.

"Please, make yourself comfortable while I prepare our meal. Apologies for the mess, I was not expecting guests today."

"This is quite a fine home you have here," you say.

"Thank you, that means a lot," Tricia replies before beginning preparations.

She starts by lighting a fire in what was obviously a hearth. As the fire begins to crackle you lay back on the pleasant surface of the bed and suddenly feel how exhausted your body is. The temptation to fall asleep was great, but you fear it would be rude to your host if you did. Perhaps engaging in conversation would help you stay awake.
12121.title: Guest of Honour

121212.content:
For a moment you watch as Tricia prepares a meal that to you looks like a giant feast. With surprising skill she slices a large variety of fruits and vegetables into more edible sizes using a large knife clenched between her teeth. Intelligence is one thing, using tools without hands completely another. She then swipes the finished product onto a large plater creating a mix of things, some of which you are unsure of being able to eat. When the silence begins to feel awkward, you let your curiosity spark and start asking questions.

"I always assumed triceratops to be social animals. I could be wrong, but you do look like you are missing a herd - or at least a companion."

Without taking her attention away from the task Tricia answers, "No, you are quite right. I did have a herd and a companion - even a beautiful son."

As the triceratops does not catch the hint to continue you are forced to enquire further.

"I see. What happened?"

"Well, we ran into some complications. Our previous settlement was attacked so we decided to search for another place to live. I, however, was wounded and could not keep up with the others so I eventually fell behind. It is just the way things are. I was a burden risking the survival of everybody else."

"Even your companion and child left you to fend for yourself?" you ask despite the grim turn of the conversation. Tricia fidgets uneasily, but dutifully continues working.

"My husband... didn't make it," she almost whispers. Your heart sinks deep and a strong feeling of compassion burns within.

"But, your son. Where is h..."

A heavy clang interrupts your question as Tricia drops the knife onto the floor. Her head droops as she fights off an outburst of grief then turns to look at you. You avoid her piercing gaze by dropping your eyes to the floor.

"Apologies," you mumble, "I got carried away."

The triceratops slowly walks over to you and gives you a gentle nuzzle, more for her own comfort than yours.

"It was night time. The horrible beasts ambushed us. There was screaming, the sounds of fighting and homes on fire. We were were cornered. My dear husband charged them in hopes of chasing them away, but it was exactly what they wanted. Several attacked me and our son from the sides. I tried to protect him, I tried. But they forced me to the ground and I fell unconscious. When I woke up it was all gone, they had not just killed what they needed. Everyone was dead. Throats ripped out and guts strewn across the ground. But the worst was to see my beloved..."

Tricia lost her voice to a heavy sob. You had heard enough and gave her nose a warm hug which she received with gratitude. Her breathing was heavy, but eventually relaxed as you soothed the tip of her snout with one hand. Finally, she lifted her head up and sighed.

"Thank you, little human. I haven't talked to anybody since then."

You nod as a sign of understanding.

"Anyway, I am pretty much done here. Would you like to settle down at the table?"

You glance at the low table in the middle of the room then return your look to Tricia. The table may have been low, but at your size it was still pretty high. Tricia gives a quick laugh at her own forgetfulness and grabs you by your collar again. The trip is short this time as you are immediately lowered onto the table. Tricia mixes up the exotic salad she has prepared before placing the large platter on the middle of the table just a hair's distance from you. She then settles down on the opposite end and gives the food a deep sniff.

"It is tradition among us triceratops that when a male and female eat together for the first time, the male chooses a treat from the platter and places it in the females mouth. The taste then determines the future relationship of the two."

"I never said I was male," you point out. Tricia sneers.

"It is pretty obvious. Now are you going to be rude and ignore the traditions of your host?"

"Well, you see, it is human tradition that the male lets the female choose the best pieces for herself. This represents the male's willingness to put his love for her before anything else in life."

"You made that up," Tricia laughs.

"Perhaps I did," you reply, "But the logic is sound, don't you think?"

Tricia agrees and decides to...
121212.title: Small Talk

choices: You easily toss the fruit in her mouth.
You trip and fall in her mouth with the fruit!
And now for something completely different...
1212121.content:
Tricia leans down, her large head filling your view. "I like the way humans supposedly do things", she says, smirking a bit, "but I must insist: it's been so long since the...last time...I got to indulge in this old tradition, and a tiny human would make such an interesting friend. And I don't think you'd want to be rude to someone of my stature, eh?"

Your eyes go wide at that, and Tricia lets out a laugh. "Oh, don't be so frightened! I wasn't threatening you, little one. I couldn't bring myself to hurt someone as adorable as you anyway!" She gives you a nuzzle and twitches her head at the salad platter. "Go on, pick anything you want."

How could you refuse? It was the least you could do to thank her for taking you in. You climb onto the platter and mull over the forest of deliciousness before you. The whole meal was a riot of color--berries so bright they looked like candy, lettuces of every shade of green, beans of rich browns and reds...if all salads you knew were like THIS, you'd have gone vegetarian in a heartbeat. Shrugging, you grab one of the smaller berries (at your size it was big as a basketball), and turn to find Tricia with her head level with the table, mouth wide open to recieve her treat...and her eyes closed. "Huh..?"

"It has to be a surprise," your triceratops hostess intones, not opening her eyes. "The taste's symbolism matters little if I KNOW what my guest picked in advance. Speaking of which..."

"Yes, TricIa; I picked out a morsel for you. Get ready!" That DID make some sense, you muse as you walk across the table. Despite Tricia's friendly demeanor, you still feel yourself shiver this close to her mouth. Being carried by your shirt was one thing; seing straight down her gullet was another. At your size, she could easily swallow you whole! (Not that she would, being an herbivore). Shaking the dark thoughts from your head, you heft the berry and prepare to toss it in...
1212121.title: A Treat for Tricia

choices: She fails to notice, and sits on you!
12121211.content:
Taking the berry in both hands, you lift it over your head and aim for Tricia's tongue before throwing it like a basketball. It travels in a smooth arc--barely missing her beak--and lands square on her tongue. Trcia's mouth snaps closed and she behins chewing the berry at once, giggling in bliss as her eyes open.

"Mmm! A red sweetberry? Good choice! That one's my favorite." She licks her beak and grins before nuzzling you, getting some berry juice on your face, which just makes you both laugh. "You have a good eye, little friend."

You wipe the juice off your face with a sleeve. "Thanks! Oh, you mentioned the taste of the morsel foretells the relationship, right? What does that berry symbolize?"

Tricia was already about to take a big bite of the salad. "That the pair eating the meal are in for a long and happy relationship, to benefit them both," she answers in a scholarly tone. Then her smile turns mischievous. "Of course, given the size difference between us, there's another meaning...according to what my dear mother always said, at least. I hope it's not true, I'd hate to sit on you by accident!"

The mental image of Tricia's wide, scaly rump crashing down on your tiny form was enough to make you drop the fusfull of lettuce and nuts you'd grabbed. Trying to hide your sudden blush, you look up at her as she has a laugh at your expense.

"Oh, did I scare you? Calm down, that wasn't some perverse threat. But Mother DID tell that story often: Father was rather short for a male, and sometime while he was courting her she tripped and ended up sitting on him, for an HOUR, without noticing him! She always said, 'Your father saw more of my rear than he ever wanted to, Tricia! Why do you think he never wants to walk behind me?'" Tricia's imitation of her mother sounded like a crude grandmother telling jokes to her kids, and you couldn't help but laugh along with her. "Though thankfully nothing like that ever happened to me."

"Your poor dad--he must have hated being the butt of the joke," you quip. "Still...I might be looking up more often from now on."

Tricia snorts laughter, the gust of wind knocking you on your back. "Oh, hush! You're just tempting me to try it!"

"Isn't it rude to flatten a guest?"

==========


The meal goes by quickly, the afternoon with it as evening approaches. Tricia had set you on her sleeping mat while she put away the platter and leftoverd, and was now thundering your way, looking a bit sleepy as she chewed on some berrries from the salad. "Mmm....these always make great dessert."

A sharow covers you, and you look up in disbelief. Tricia's wide saurian rear was poised over you--in her sleepiness, she'd forgotten you were there!

"AAAH! Tricia! WAIT! I'm down here!" You yell, as her rear descends...
12121211.title: Berry Toss

choices: Go to sleep--it's been a tiring day!
Tricia awkwardly asks if she can sit on you again.
121212111.content:
Your warning, sadly, went unheard. Tricia's plump rear plopped down on your form, her left cheek a fleshy boulder before you could even scream, giving you a face/mouth-full of the crushing mass and flattening you into the sleeping mat. Insane pressure and weight smashes your form, so great you can barely move, even to get the dino-flab out of your mouth. A few twitches of your hands reveal you’re completely covered by Tricia's rear--all you feel is the pressing weight, not even the curve of her cheek. You’d all but vanished beneath her booty.

The only mercy was that you were trapped under ONE cheek, not wedged between them or in the path of any flatulence, which would very likely be fatal.

...Not that it was an improvement, as Tricia's rear gave a few lazy twists, grinding you beneath it as she sighed in bliss. You moan in pain, praying she’ll notice that she sat on you before you're crushed or suffocate.

Her voice rumbles from above. “Mmm...It's been so long since I’ve had company, little one. Thank you for being such a charming guest. I hope you don't mind sharing a sleeping mat, or being cuddled like a cute toy...little human? Where'd you go?”

Salvation! Hope swells, and you thrash about as much as you can, trying to alert Tricia. You even bite down on the flab in your mouth--though with her tough hide it's barely a poke--and scream as loud as your muffled voice can manage. It goes on for half a minute before you hear Tricia gasp.

“Oh! Oh...my. Did I...SIT on my guest?” With that, Tricia gets up...and you remain plastered to her behind. You feel yourself being gently peeled off, not caring that she used her mouth to do it, and set back on the sleeping mat, looking up at Tricia's concerned/embarrassed face as she coos over you.

“I’m so sorry! Is anything broken? Can you breathe? Do you need to clean up? Did I pass--”

“Miss Tricia!” You croak out. “I’m...mostly fine. The mat was soft, and I wasn't under you for too long.”

She sighs and nuzzles you. “Thank Heaven...I would hate to lose you, especially like THAT. I hope being under my tush wasn't too unpleasant.”

You kiss her snout, and she squees. “Not really, hurt a lot, but...kinda soft.”

She giggles. “Your little attention-getting tickle was a decent massage as well. I'm almost tempted to ask for seconds, perverse as it is!"

"Find a way to sit on me painlessly, and I'll consider it," you quip...only half joking.

With that bit of butt-based trauma out of the way, you and Tricia decide to...
121212111.title: She fails to notice, and sits on you!

1212121112.content:
An uncomfortable silence settles into Tricia's home. You watch as your hostess paws at the ground while making an effort to avoid your gaze. Something is bothering her mind and you want to know what it is.

"Everything OK?" you ask, "If you're burdening your mind with what just happened, you need not feel embarrassed. It was an accident."

Tricia looks at you.

"You did not seem too offended by it," she says. You shake your head.

"I rather enjoyed it," she continues, laughing awkwardly, "I was wondering whether you would like to do it again."

You feel a trickle of cold sweat run down the back of your neck. Was she asking permission to consciously sit on you?

"I would be careful, of course. The idea of you trapped under me is rather - exciting."

You consider it for a moment. This triceratops seemed rather insistent and she had been kind enough to shelter you. Besides, it is only a little fun that she is looking for - fun to share with her guest.

"You three-horns don't have any shame, do you?" you ask jokingly. Tricia giggles.

"Let's just say we are not afraid to take what we want."

"Why do I sense that you are not too concerned over whether I give you permission."

Hearing this, Tricia brings her beak down to your ear and whispers, "Perhaps because I am not, my little guest."

Your hostess stands up and turns away from you. You stare at her great triceratopsian butt as she bends her rear legs and hovers just above your tiny body. Her tail raises to display her privates, one a sinkhole and the other a great crevice, both capable of swallowing you up. You take a couple steps back in a mixture of awe and fright and end up tripping. Tricia cranes her neck passing you a mischievous look as if saying, enjoy this for I shall. With that, she lets her knees fold and drops her mass upon you.

The world goes dark. You entire body disappears under the flesh of your triceratopsian hostess. The warmth of her tough yet soft hide envelopes you like an living landslide, wiping out all trace of your existence. As if this was not enough, she begins to grind her butt against her bedroll, smothering you further into her flesh. The heat of the excitement develops a moist layer of sweat on her hide and as she continues to grind, her moisture begins to soak your body. Eventually, the wetness forces itself into your mouth, giving you a strong taster of her saltiness. You try to spit the taste of her hide out of your mouth, but this only allows her buttocks to force itself further into your mouth.

Suddenly, you feel the air being forced out of your lungs as Tricia presses down hard. You fear she may have lost herself as you feel the crushing weight of her body begin to break your bones. You want to scream, but all you get is more of her cheek into your mouth. Just as you start to lose consciousness the immense pressure relaxes and you find yourself able to breathe again. The air is thick and smells strongly of triceratops, but it is air nonetheless. Next, you get your sight back as Tricia lifts her enormous butt off of you and gives you a good view of her moist privates. It seems that she is done, though, as she stands up and turns around to face you. She lays down again, using her forelegs to surround you and nudges your puny body with her beak.

"That was nice, little human. Thank you."

You are too exhausted to reply and simply gaze up at her great face. Her eyes show a mixture of sympathy and desire, but soon you lose sight of them as she leans in with her beak. Her breath is heavy and smells strongly of eaten berries. She holds that position for a second, simply letting her breath warm your exhausted self as she whispers soothing words to you.

"Sleep, little one. Sleep. Nothing can harm you here. You are safe with me."

The last thing you feel is the tip of her tongue on your face before your eyes force themselves shut, sucking you into a world of dreams.
1212121112.title: Sharing her body

choices: You are somewhere warm, wet, and smelling of digested foods. (Tricia's Stomach)
Warm but there is a pressure on your lower body and chest (Tricia asleep on you)
12121211121.content: You groan. the near oxygen deprivation has caused quite a headache.You rub the top of your head and you realize where you are and what exactly your hostess has done...
12121211121.title: The following morning...

choices: Somewhere warm and wet.. and smelling of Tricia's scent. (Unbirth)
Cold and alone. Tricia left you alone for the night.
121212111213.content: You rub your eyes again and see that you are...
121212111213.title: Other

choices: Tell the truth--that you fell through some kind of portal to this world.
Be vague...for now. You might need to learn more about this place.
121212112.content:
Your frantic shouts reach Tricia's ears, and she halts her behind's fall at the last second. She cranes her head around and gasps at spotting you, "Oh dear--I'm sorry! I iust get so tired after a big meal...are you alright?"

"Gah... Yes, I'm fine; you stopped just in time." You take the chances to scurry off to the side, out of the shadow of Tricia's rump. She slowly sits down once you're in the clear. Even taking such care, the impact still makes the floor shake beneath you. You sigh in relief, trying to calm your
adrenaline rush. "That was too close...guess there is something to your triceratops tradition after all."

Tricia laughs despite herself. "I supoose THAT ended any skepticism you may have had..." with care, she takes you into her beak gently tosses you onto her muzzle. Her eyes go a little crossed as she looks at you. "So, little one, how DID you happen to be wandering about near here? This is peaceful land, but still rather dangerous for a human."

You hesitate. This wasn't your world--talking dinosaurs made that obvious--but was that sort of bombshell something you really wanted to drop so soon...?
121212112.title: NOT The Butt Of The Joke

choices: There is commission during the night.
You wake up in the morning.
1212121122.content:
You open your mouth to speak, but catch your tongue and rethink your words. You look into Tricia’s crossed eyes and wonder whether she can actually see you in her periphery. You lean back against her snout-horn at loss for words until you get an impatient grunt from your hostess.

“I come from a land far from here and very different in nature. It is a place you definitely have not heard of. Through a series of events I cannot explain, I find myself here. My land is not here – as in here in itself…”. You trail off into a mumble with no comprehension of what you are trying to say.

Tricia tilted her head in confusion and almost made you fall off. She quickly corrected herself with an apologetic laugh. “Do you mean you do not come from this mass of land – as in this continent? Do you come across the great oceans?”

“Quite further than that.”

“Gracious! How big is this world?”

“Big,” you assure her.

“So, this place you come from is ruled by you humans. You said you never had seen my kind before, yet you obviously now of my kind. And we know of you. There must be a connection. Are you all so small?”

“To you we would seem small, yes, and though we come in various sizes, this is by no means my natural size. I honestly cannot tell you what has occurred.”

“Maybe some sort of magic brought you here at your size. Perhaps the Creator is playing a sick joke on you – or punishing you.”

“I may come from far away, but you do not honestly expect me to believe in this Creator and magic.”

“And why not?”

“Well, you seem quite intelligent. You behave and utilize tools on a level no human could never have imagined…”

“What do you mean, never have imagined? What did you think we were? Prehistoric beasts that roam the land like mindless drones rolling in their own excrement? I’ll have you know am well versed in botany and the art of healing. My father could craft wood into any shape he desired and my dear late husband could tend the earth in any climate. You would be in some raptors gut or worse had our paths not met.”

Tricia’s outburst makes you regret your words and fills you with embarrassment. “Or worse?”

“Let’s just say being crushed under my rare is not a bad way to go in this land – especially for a little thing like you,” Tricia says with a wink, “Now, enough gab. It’s been a long day and you must be exhausted. I hope you do not mind sharing a bed. I do not want anything nicking you during the night and it would be rude to keep a guest in a cage. Just try to keep clear of my rare.”

Using her powerful beak, Tricia gently grabs you by the midsection and carries you over to her bedding where you are settled in between her forelegs that surround you like protective crib. The triceratops reaches over to a basket and pulls out a twig from which she bites off the end and offers it to you.

“Chew on that. It is a type of root and it’s good for your dental hygiene – something I’m sure you humans don’t much care for.”

You take the bit of twig from her beak and examine it. The thing was slimy from her spittle and the thought of gnawing on it repulsed you. Nonetheless, you place it in your mouth and chew, trying to ignore the sliminess. When that doesn’t help you imagine it like kissing a girl. A dinosaur girl… of gargantuan proportions… whose butt nearly crushed you. By now you had chewed the twig enough for the feeling to go away. It seems to have a refreshing taste.

“Maybe you dinosaurs are smarter than I give credit for. And thank you for having me. I truly wish to avoid some raptors gut – or worse.”

Tricia gives a prideful sneer. Her head rests on her leg, right above you. Part of her own twig sticks out of her jaws as she chews on the other end. “You’re welcome. Good night, now.”

You spit out your twig, feeling a bit bad about doing it on her bedding, but your hostess had not exactly provided you with an alternative. Curling up against her chest, you close your eyes and listen to the strange sounds coming from outside, the peaceful mastication of her jaw and the steadiness of her breathing. It all blends together and lulls you to sleep.
1212121122.title: Talk of Strange Worlds

12121211222.content:
You wake up to the soothing sound of humming. It is dark, but you can make out the outlines of Tricia’s gargantuan body looming over you. Her legs are wrapped around you and her head is so that you can feel her calm breaths. She is humming a gentle tune that reminds you of your childhood lullabies.

“What time is it?” you ask sleepily. Tricia stops her tune and looks down at you. Her frill looks so big from your perspective that it darkens the already dark room.

“Just before sunrise, my little guest. Go back to sleep. You’re safe.” Back home that is exactly what you would have done, but the excitement from your current circumstances makes you feel exceptionally well rested, so instead you stand up and have a stretch.

“Sleep well then?” the triceratops ask with a patronizing tone. She presses the point of her beak against you and nudges, giggling as you stumble over. For a moment she hovers over you, but soon enough a gush of warm air washes over you and her tongue slips out for an affectionate kiss. The slick appendage slides up and down your small body, smothering dinosaur drool into every orifice. You try to keep the substance out of your mouth, but the pressure is too much. Finally, at the point of suffocation, the tongue slips back into its humid cave with a wet slurp, leaving you to sputter and cough in an attempt to get the saliva out of your mouth. The stuff is primarily tasteless with a hint of sweetie-saltiness, but it was the hot sliminess that made you gag in disgust. Yet, to your embarrassment, a flurry of warm emotions flood your mind and body.

Meanwhile, Tricia reaches over to her side to light and oil lamp. Within the glass bulb, a bright flame dances and casts the large shadow of your hostess across the cottage. She watches you scramble up onto your feet, still wet from her kiss. Your eyes meet hers. The pupils are like deep pools leading to the depths of her mind. Something told you that she knew you were secretly enjoying this. Nonetheless, having your already tattered clothes go through another round of such rough treatment is bound to cause irreparable wear. You have no fresh set of clothes to change into – let alone any sewing skills.

“Aren’t you just the sweetest little thing,” Tricia coos. You chuckle in a sarcastic manner.

“You are a kind and gentle hostess – and I am eternally grateful for what you have done for me, but…”

“Spit it out,” Tricia says almost menacingly as you hesitate.

“Would it be too much for me to ask not to be this wet all the time?” you ask jokingly, knowing it will not make a difference. Simultaneously, you walk towards the gap under the joint of her right leg.

A hearty laugh erupts from within the triceratops’ chest, “I’m sorry. You’re just so cute.” She shifts her right leg to allow you to pass under her. You now face down the full length of her body. The size and distance that it reaches makes you dizzy. Far away behind her rear, you see her tail peacefully swing back and forth. As you walk, you look back to see her looking at you, curious about what you plan to do. Halfway there, you pause and rest against her belly. Her heart beat is deep and distant, while the occasional groan betrays her hunger for breakfast. Despite the firmness of her scaled abdomen, something about the steady contractions of her breathing makes it comforting. Just then you feel the tip of Tricia’s tongue scrape your ear. Your view is completely eclipsed by her muzzle.

“You’d like to be in there wouldn’t you”, she whispers seductively. Shivers of excitement rush down your spine as you keep on pressing against the living musculature. “There’s plenty of space in there for you. There is no safer place, you know. You could let go of all your fears and surrender to me. To let my warmth surround you, my body to claim you.”

Your heart begins to race as her words create sensations of fear and curiosity in your mind. She is trying to convince you to let her eat you alive – and it was working. Pushing away from her belly you turn and hug the tip of her beak. It parts slightly as she intentionally exhales through her mouth, engulfing you in her warm breath. With all your strength you attempt to hoist yourself inside – and get knocked down.

“I don’t believe that worked”, Tricia shrieks as you recover your posture. She had nudged you with her beak to prevent you from climbing in. “I know that it’s very hard to resist me, but who in their right mind would willingly get eaten?”

Tricia continues to laugh as you walk away embarrassed.

“Come on, little guy! I’m only toying with you.” She reaches out and nudges you back against her belly. “Tell you what, since you like my body so much, I’ll let you do something special.”

You are pushed towards her rare end and you awkwardly approach her thighs as she gives you encouraging looks. Her tail stops swinging as she leans onto her left side and lifts her right leg to reveal her most precious secret.

“I haven’t had any love in such a long time and could use some comforting. After all, we trikes aren’t blessed with hands like you humans are so we must help each other out wherever we can. Once a girl invites a guy inside, there are no secrets. Only friendship and love. I don’t know how much you can help me at your size, but you’ve proven yourself a crafty guy.”

You stare awestruck at the view in front of you. All of it feels so wrong at every level, yet a powerful urge inside of you tells you otherwise. Does this triceratops not see anything wrong with it? Probably. She just doesn’t care.

“I don’t kn…”

“No buts, little guy. There are no freeloaders in my household. If you prefer you may explore my other hole instead – if you’re into that kind of thing.” She winks. “Now get to work.”

Tricia’s tone is still friendly. It is obvious that she means no ill will, but it is also obvious that there is no arguing a playful triceratops. The only question is, which do you prefer? Her lustful slit that was bigger than you, or her glorious rare that you could not see under the shadow of her tail, but was definitely no less impressive?
12121211222.title: Morning Love

choices: She notices he is inside her mouth.
She gulps him down before opening her eyes.
12121212.content:
You miscalculate the distance and before you notice your tripping inside her beak. At feeling the weight in her tongle Trícia closes her mouth and squishes you around within her slimy mouth.
You fight to stay above the waves of flesh and berrie juices until suddently trícia stops.
12121212.title: You trip and fall in her mouth with the fruit!

121212121.content:
As the wet massage starts to get unbearable you are granted respite as your hostess pauses her mouth play on realizing there was something else in her jaw. You are laid to rest on the tongue, soaked in saliva and covered by chewed up berry.

Here, you are given the opportunity to acknowledge that you are inside the mouth of this triceratops. A living, breathing triceratops. Fear and panic at the thought of being inside the jaws of a prehistoric beast gets your heart beating and blood running. You may have ended up flailing about in panic had not the previous ordeal of being treated like a treat sapped your strength. Breathing alone was hard enough. The air was heavy and moist, something that took effort to breathe in. The space was rank with the stale odour of moldy vegetation mixed with the sweetness of the recently chewed up berry. As relieved as you are that the smell is not revolting, it is not pleasant either.

Nonetheless, the brief moment of reprise comes to an abrupt end as the tongue beneath you rises and slams you against the hard palate. No later does a vacuum engulf you as Tricia begins to suck on you like candy. Thanks to the firm hold the tongue has on you, you are not taken away by the the force while everything else in the mouth is pulled along the tongue deeper into the cavernous maw. Finally, the suction stops and a moment later a wet gulp echoes from the darkness, signifying an end to the moment as your hostess sends the treat you had picked for her on its way. Then the tongue drags across your body to clear any debris before light floods the cavernous mouth and you slide down onto the dinner table in a puddle of triceratopsian spit.

"Oh my", Tricia remarks as she watches you wipe your face on the tablecloth, "Never have I heard of the male offering himself as the love bite."

"I hope my taste was pleasing", you mutter, playing along with the joke.

Tricia leans in with her massive beak and breathes seductively onto you, an act that may have excited you were you not soaked in her spit.

"I must admit that you do have a savoury touch to you, little one", she said, teasingly smacking her mouth in your face, "I admit to almost swallowing you - even after I realized you were in there. I hope I have not offended you."

"Offended?" you ask confused.

"It was so sweet of you to offer yourself to me like that. Trust me, I would have gladly gobbled you up if I were not so lonely. Please forgive me, but I really appreciate your company."

Uneasiness creeps up your back. What you thought had been just playful teasing from this triceratops may have, in fact, had far more sincerity to it than you are comfortable with. To crown it all you hear a loud rumble emanate from Tricia's direction.

"Goodness me", she says, "Lets not waste any more time. Please help yourself to anything on the plate. I assure you that it is all edible."

You decide to forget any concerns for your personal safety as you realize that you too are starving. Tricia seemed like a gentle giant after all, if a bit passionate. If she wanted to hurt you she already would have. Nonetheless, you deem it wise to avoid getting too close to her as you watch her dig her beak into the pile of food on the platter like a ravenous beast.
121212121.title: She notices he is inside her mouth.

1212121211.content:
Later the same evening you find yourself laying on the dinner table as Tricia clears away the dishes. A silence of content and satisfaction settles in the triceratops’ home. Tricia hums happily to herself as you study your surroundings, contemplating mainly on how much bigger and impractical everything suddenly is. A few moments of looking out of the window into the dark and rainy night has you realize how lucky you are to have been picked up by this seemingly gentle giant as opposed something more vicious.

A moment passes when you suddenly realize that you are being watched. You look up from your thoughts and find Tricia with her soft eyes on you. She does not speak, but simply studies you curiously like one would a small rodent. Except that you remain still and stare back at her. When she decides you are not going to make a start, an all too familiar feeling surrounds you as that monstrous beak of her parts and grabs you by the collar of your shirt. Next thing you know, you are being carried again against your will, this time towards the corner of her hut where a pile of furs are spread out, obviously serving the purpose of a resting place. It does not take long for your hostess to lay down, setting you in front of her and closing her forelegs around you. You take a moment to get adjusted to your new position.

”Furs?” you contemplate aloud, ”Not the first thing I would expect from… you.”

”Do not let my dietary habits fool you. Had you turned out to be a little pest I would not have hesitated to make you a red stain.” Tricia playfully hovers her foot above you to reinforce her point. You nervously back up, but trip. Tricia immediately brings her foot down and pins you under one of her clawed toes. ”Besides, I got them off a trader.”

You struggle to free yourself from the monstrous claw, but this only serves to amuse your hostess. Your futile squirming even makes her giggle.

”Now, I must enquire, what purpose does this outer skin of yours serve?” Tricia asks as she studies your dirty clothes.

”They protect my skin, of course,” you reply, ”And they are a fashion statement. It is part of human culture. Surely, a fine lady like you appreciates good fashion.”

”Naturally, but why wear them continuously? They gather filth – and I cannot help wonder whether you are compensating for the lack of something.”

You pass Tricia a questioning glance. She winks. Suddenly, her beak leans in and skilfully tears off your shirt. She then tosses it away.

”Hey, I need those!” you shout, but she ignores you. Everything else follows suite and soon you find yourself nude under the claw of this beast.

”I knew it,” Tricia remarks, ”So small and pathetic – cute even.”

You quickly realize she is talking about your male part and blush out if embarrassment. You then feel something that makes you shudder. The moist warmth of Tricia’s breath flows over you right before the tip of her tongue brushes against your groin.

”What are you…” you try whimpering, but never manage to finish as the monstrous tongue slips out again, this time running over your face.

”You are such a helpless little thing,” she whispers as you spit out her thick saliva, ”I think I will keep you around.”

Another round from the tongue keeps you from protesting, this time covering your whole body. By this point she releases you from under her claw and you instinctively crawl away from her.

”What do you mean keep me around?” you stutter. To this the triceratops giggles and yet again closes her legs around you.

”Let’s be honest, I was never going to let you go out there alone. Your best option is to stay here with me. I will protect you and feed you. All I demand is for you to accept me as your mistress.”

”I thought you wanted to help me get back home.”

”I do. This is your new home. Give yourself to me. Be mine and the life you knew before will have no meaning to you.”

”Is refusal an option?” you ask.

”I suppose nothing is stopping you from attempting to escape. Though I should warn you that I am not very kind towards defiant slaves.”

The threat in her voice sends shivers down your spine. You should have guessed that helping a giant beast would lead to this. The choices presented to you were both harsh with consequences. Are you willing to become a play-thing to this passionate triceratops or do you want to risk her wrath?
1212121211.title: Choices

choices: Tricia and Arathir want to have fun, including you.
12121212111.content:
Days pass. Days turn into weeks. Weeks into months. At this point you are not even sure whether the passing of time is the same as at home. Your watch had stopped when you ended up in this strange world. For all you know, a day could be hours longer in this world. Even hours could be completely different to what you are used to.
It does not matter. What matters now is your mistress – the great three-horned Tricia. She had made you her pet, her slave, her possession. You belong to her and do exactly as she commands. You rub her feet when she wants. You polish her horns when she demands. You even wipe her ass if she requires. Over time, you become well aware of your mistress’ needs and desires. Her body is your purpose. Its functions become second nature to you.

Yet for all the loss of freedom you once knew, you learn to accept your place as this saurian goddess’ servant. She protects you, feeds you, and cherishes you. Her motherly love for you is unmatched. She plays with you and makes you play with her in any way she desires. She jealously guards you like a dog over a bone. You are hers and she does whatever she wants with you.

Over the past few weeks Tricia had been going out for extended periods of time. She would leave early and return late. Whenever you asked she said she had been foraging, which did not convince you. Whenever she left she would lock you up in a cage, partly due to the risk of something coming in and stealing you, mainly because of your only escape attempt which had failed miserably.

One evening Tricia returned except that this time she had someone with her. She entered her hut, cooing a hello at you like she usually did and then there emerged a bulkier looking figure from the entryway. You understood immediately what Tricia had been looking for all this time. This was a male triceratops. He stepped in and sniffed the air. One could sense his pleasure as he picked up the strong scent of a lonely female. Then his eyes caught you. He marched up to the cage with floor shaking steps and gave it a rough nudge, toppling you over to his amusement.

”So, this is the human,” he spoke with a mocking tone. He followed your tiny movements as you began to unconsciously shiver. ”How pathetic.”
Tricia immediately came to your defense.

”Don’t say that! He is an unfortunate soul who has ended up in a strange world full of mean things that would gladly make him a snack. Besides, he is a lovely toy, and quite willing at that. Aren’t you dear?”

Tricia winks at you. You had gotten used to this. Besides, she was too big for you to resist.

That night was different. Tricia did not let you out of your cage like she normally did. She did not play with you or snuggle up with you in bed. No. This time she had a partner. A real partner. As you lie on the straw-bedded floor of your cage, you listen as the two triceratops flirt with each other. It is too dark to see anything, but then you start hearing grunts and moans. It is obvious what is happening. Is this how your significance will end? A small tear forms in your eye, right before you drift into sleep.


* * *


The next morning you wake up to Tricia and the male triceratops already having breakfast. You yawn as you stand up and stretch which catches your mistress’ attention. She comes over to the cage and unhinges the latch.

”Good morning, my little cutie. It’s about time you woke up.”

You move up to the entrance of the cage and let her grab you by your collar, as she did every morning. At least this had not changed. Tricia lifts you into the air and places you onto the dining table so that you are in between two massive triceratopsian heads, both with curious eyes looking down at you. As per usual, you move over to the breakfast platter and start picking out things for yourself. The two triceratops join in and once again you get to listen to the chewing of massive jaws mere inches away. In between the eating the male triceratops starts to speak.

”I can see how it can be handy as a slave. Not very useful in terms of actual servant work, but quite fun as a toy.” You continue to eat, acting stupid. Tricia breaks in.

”He is not an it and I consider him a part of the family. He is loyal, and more than a mere toy.” Then she turns to you with her familiar cherishing voice. ”Let me introduce Arathir. He’ll be staying with us for now. I’m sure you’ll enjoy having another man keeping you company.” You turn to look at Arathir and he passes you a nasty grin.

”So, I understand that Tricia has been kind enough to be your mistress,” he says with a sneer,”I hope that courtesy applies to me too – considering I will be the man of the house for now.” The manner in which this triceratops talks to you ignites a flame of fury inside you, but then Tricia’s training kicks in and you merely bow your head.

”Yes, sir.”

”Sir!” he remarks,”I could get used to that.”
12121212111.title: New Life

121212121112.content:
Tricia “well I have to get dinner, Have fun you two”.
Tricia leaves the house leaving you with Arathir. He smiles at you with a mischievous smile.
Arathir “Hello human”.
You “uh, hi”. You say nervously.
Arathir “Let’s have some fun”.
*BOOM*
*THUMP*
*THUMP*
*THUMP
*CRUNCH*
Just then, in lightning speed a huge red T-Rex comes in smashing through the front door biting his neck crushing his spine and windpipe, killing him.
While the T-Rex devours his corpse getting blood on the floor, the walls, and its face. You notice its eyes stray towards your cage. The T-Rex stops eating Arathir’s corpse.
T-Rex “Well, well, well, what do we have here a pet of some kind”.
The T-Rex’s voice is feminine.
You “I’m a human”. You speak nervously
T-Rex “oh, you speak”.
Still nervous you reply “Um, yeah”.
T-Rex “What a perfect prize for the perfect kill. You’re coming with me”.
121212121112.title: Tricia leaves you with Arathir.

choices: You manage to stay ahead of her
12121212112.content:
Despite your helplessness, you still feel some bit of defiance. No…you weren’t simply going to accept your fate. Despite the danger, you were going to try and keep [i]some[/i] of your dignity. Steeling yourself, you stop your comical struggling and look Tricia in the eyes—trying not to wince at the sparkle of glee in them as she kept you pinned. Licking your lips, you answer her threat.

“No.”

Tricia grunts and tilts her head. “‘No’ what, my little pet?” She chirps, giving you a slight squeeze and making you yelp despite yourself. This giant dinosaur was clearly enjoying toying with you.

“No, I [i]won’t[/i] be just that—a pet; a slave,” you answer. “I [i]won’t[/i] spend the rest of my life here, at the mercy of a giant dinosaur who would have crushed me to a pulp for being a bit annoying.”
Your fear begins to drift away—anger was taking its place. “Is this how it works—you can simply lord over anyone smaller than you, even after they helped you? After you took them in as a guest; shared a meal with them?!”

Tricia snorts steam, chuckling harshly. “You removed a tooth that was causing me pain, little one; nothing more. Do not act as if I owe you my life. And you offered yourself as part of that meal, as I recall. Why are you being do defiant at being mine in a way besides a snack?”

“Says the one who was doubled over in pain on the ground,” you retort. “And I fell in your mouth by ACCIDENT!” At that moment you realize she HADN’T been kidding when she said she would have gladly eaten you had she been less lonely. You try not to let the new fear show.

Tricia growls, a sound like a landslide. Her teasing expression falls, revealing one of pure dominance. You try not to gulp at how fierce she looks—a true prehistoric titaness. “So…I take it you reject my offer?”

“I am your guest, not a pet. You answer.

Tricia snorts again. “Fine, then. That is your choice. Now see my rebuttal.”

With that she drops you and rises to all all fours, glaring down at you…and smirking devilishly.
“My turn, little one.”

You break into a run, thundering footsteps and Tricia's giggling behind you.
12121212112.title: Defiance

choices: Try to make her cough you out.
121212121122.content:
You run as fast as you can with one objective. To get away from this triceratops. Tricia's deliberate slowness could just give you a chance. Perhaps you could fool her. Act unexpectedly. An idea comes to you and you intend to act on it - just when your world goes dark and something heavy clamps around your waist. You cry out in pain as the force almost snaps your spine. The air around you turns humid with a familiar stale odor giving you a strong sense of where you are. Tricia had snatched the upper half of your body in her beak and soon enough you were once more assaulted by her tongue. The wet muscle smothers your face in saliva denying you the ability to breathe. At the same time she lifts her head up with your legs still flailing outside her mouth, though this does not last as she sucks them in like noodles hanging off of her jawline.

"And this is what I do to naughty pets," Tricia says with drool running down her chin. Her mouth was quickly filling up with saliva and she did not spare you from a thorough bath. Her tongue pushes you between her molars and she bites down with just enough control not to break you. Your whimpers are met with more saliva as the tongue pulls you away from the teeth. "I am rather disappointed that you would refuse my more than generous offer." You try to push the monstrous muscle away from you, but Tricia simply smothers your face again, forcing saliva down your throat. "Maybe I should have just swallowed you - since that is obviously the only thing you are willing to offer me." Her tongue tilts up and you feel yourself slide towards her throat.

"Wait," you scream, "Tricia! Please, no!" You stop sliding and the tongue pushes you away from your doom.

"Changed your mind have you? I don't know. I thought we had something going between the two of us. You obviously seem not to think that way."

"I'm sorry," you scream. Fear would have formed tears in your eyes would the triceratops's saliva not have soaked your face.

"Very well. You are rather cute and it would be a shame to end our relationship like this." You sigh in relief at hearing this, but quickly your heart starts racing again.

"I'll make you a deal. If you can force your way out of my mouth, I will spare you. If not... well, you were not very dedicated after all, were you?"

"How do you expect me to..." your words are cut short as Tricia releases a belch without opening her mouth. Immediately, her mouth is permeated in the stomach-lurching smell of her gut. All you can do is gag.

"Smell that? That's where you'll be if you do not pick up the pace. You have a minute. Better get to work."

Tricia's words are harsh, but sincere. You cannot see anything in the blackness of her maw, but you have a good idea where her throat and beak are. Thinking quickly you figure out two options. Either you can try prying her jaws open, but what were the chances of you being able to do that? The other idea is to irritate her gullet and make her cough you out, but that moved you dangerously close to the edge.
121212121122.title: Tricia's Special Treatment

choices: It Worked! She coughs you out!
1212121211222.content:
You remember the vice grip of Tricia’s beak and cringe. Prying her jaw open would never work if she had that kind of strength; and her maw was too slippery and cramped for you to get any leverage. That left trying to make the triceratops cough you up.

...Which meant you’d have to move closer to the pit of her throat. Trying to control your shivering, you grab hold of her tongue with both hands and slowly pull yourself along; keeping your feet planted to feel out for the sudden drop. Tricia giggles--within her mouth, the sound is booming.

“If you’re trying to tickle your way out, it won’t work,” she quips. “But feel; free to try, it’s rather plesant. Mmm...now that you’ve been in there for a while, I can say you’re rather tasty.” A new rush of saliva hits you as her mouth waters anew, and you’re swamped by the flood; nearly losing your grip on her tongue. And the clock was still ticking...you had to hurry!

…There! Your kicking legs suddenly don’t have a tongue under them; you’d reached the back of her throat! Now all you had to do was kick at her uvula hard enough to irritate it: the gag reflex would make Tricia retch and cough you out.

IF dinosaurs even had uvulae, that was.
Maybe this wasn’t the best plan after all.

But, it was still better than being eaten alive.

Lifting your head, you try and peer into the darkness for the punching-bag shape of the organ--

“Time’s almost up, little one!” Tricia teases, a giggle on her voice. She was relishing toying with you, almost eager to eat you. But her taunt caused movement…of a uvula!

Hope surges, and you let out a cheer! There it was! The ticket to your survival. Grinning like a loon, you bend a leg back and ready the strongest kick you can manage, aiming at the fleshy punching bag.

What the heck, why not throw in a one-liner? “Hey Tricia! Might want to get some cough drops!”

You lash out with a snap-kick, and strike the uvula dead-on!

Tricia’s surprised yelp is like a cannon shot in the cramped confines of her mouth, and then...
1212121211222.title: Cough it Up

12121212112222.content:
In your mind this played out differently. In your mind, a swift kick to the uvula would cause an involuntary cough. You'd be sent flying out of her surprised, open mouth and escaped with your life. Sure, whatever would happen after she spat you up would be a mystery, but at least you wouldn't have to worry about being eaten. Yes sir, things certainly would've been better if they played out like they did in your mind... Except it didn't.

In reality, you were still idiotically smirking from your action movie wannabe one-liner when the force of her cough knocked you off balance. You fell on your ass, your legs dangling over the precipice of her throat. Meanwhile, her tongue rolled up and the waves of saliva she'd accumulated from savoring your flavor washed over you like high tide. You screamed like a little girl as you were sent over the edge. The fleshy walls of her throat hugged you for a split-second and then--

GULP!

Tricia stifled another cough as she felt you working your way down her throat. Despite your miniscule size, she could your frantic struggles. You got stuck at one point, causing her to swallow deeply again. This time you were sent on your way without issue and she could fully enjoy the tickles your meager form made while trying to save itself. Eventually you landed in the cavernous confines of her stomach and Tricia let out a satisfied sigh.

"Looks like you didn't want it bad enough," she said.

You were too busy sputtering up stomach juices to respond. You'd landed amidst the remains of the salad she'd prepared you both for dinner. Was it your imagination or did you even recognize the remains of the berry you'd fed to her earlier. The sight of your surroundings made you panic more than ever. You waded through the remains of days-old meals to her stomach wall and began pounding on it.

"TRICIA! TRICIA, PLEASE LET ME OUT!"

Her response was succinct.

"UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!"{ /i}

"Goodness me," she said, blushing at the force of her titanic belch. "I guess humans make me gassy. Who would've guessed?"

"TRICIA!" you yelled helplessly.

"Oh hush, you," she said. "You had your chance to live happily ever after with me and you blew it. If you'd played your cards right, you'd be giving me a belly massage from the outside right now instead of from the inside. But then again, I suppose this is what you wanted all along, isn't it? Ever since you fed yourself to me with that berry? Maybe it was rude of me not to take you up on your initial offer. Oh well, all's well that ends well."

"I told you! That was an accident! I slipped into your mouth!"

The dinosaur chuckled. "Oh sure, right. You "slipped" into my mouth. Just like you "slipped" into my belly just now? Honestly, I gave you a fair shot at escape and instead of taking it, you headed straight for the back of my throat. At least if you'd tried to pry apart my jaws I would've known you were serious about surviving. You'd have to be the biggest idiot in the world to do what you did if you didn't want me to eat you."

"But I really am the biggest idiot in the world! I really did think I could escape this way!"

"Well, technically you were right about that. It's just that the path you've taken means it'll be a long time before you escape. And by then..." she trailed off meaningfully.

"LET ME OUT!" you screamed in a blind panic, thrashing at her stomach walls. "PLEASE LET ME OUT!"

"Hush, darling. It's time to accept your fate. And it's time for me to get some shut-eye. Nothing puts me to sleep faster than a full stomach."

Your behemoth prison shook as Tricia waddled over to the furs she used as a bed, knocking you down into the lake of chewed lettuce and stomach acid. The triceratops curled up on her bed and sighed contentedly as you kept kicking and screaming inside her belly.

She let out a sleepy belch and licked her lips at your aftertaste. "Mmmmm... No wonder you humans are almost extinct. A taste like that can make a girl go carnivore."

Seconds later she was asleep, leaving you trapped with the fleshy confines of her stomach. The desperation of your situation made you cry. You can't believe you'd ever helped this evil titan. The only question now was, how long would it be before you digest?
12121212112222.title: She swallows on reflex....

121212121122221.content:
Tricia's heartbeat was a steady thunder within her belly, and it wasn't long before it slowed to a peaceful rhythm. Her breathing also mellowed, sleep soon overtaking the triceratops. Seen from without, she may have even looked cute, curled up on her sleeping mat with a smirk on her beak.

Inside her belly, the scene was far from peaceful. You kept screaming and begging to be let loose, offering to be her pet; punching and kicking the fleshy walls, desperate to irritate her stomach enough to retch you out--or just wake her up...but like you harebrained idea of kicking her uvula, it was useless. All you got was a mumble and sleepy giggle: you were just tickling her stomach.

After half an hour of futile thrashing, you start to hear a strange hissing noise coming from the ankle deep stomach juices...
And then, pain.

With You yelp and look down...seeing a horrific bubbling around your feet. Tricia's acids were going to work! Already your shoes were beginning to warp and melt into sludge.

You let out a scream of mindless terror and bolt for a thick leaf of lettiuce that escaped un-chewed. Scrambling onto the makeshift raft, you examine your legs, just as your half-liquified shoes drip off your feet and into the acidic lake. Your feet are reddened and bleeding, already forming terrible scars: a classic chemical burn.

It truly hits you that you were going to be digested alive.

"TRICIA! PLEASE!" you wail, tears streaming down your face. "I DON'T DESERVE THIS! PLEASE DON'T DIGEST ME! HAVE MERCY!!"

There is no response from the titan.

You keep screaming, even as her belly goes to work on your refuge. Fumes from digestion make your head spin, and you manage one last sob of mortal terror before you finally sink into the boiling liquid, a spew of bubbles marking your passage.


======

Tricia awoke with the sunrise, a smile on her face. She could still just taste her little snack on her tongue, and his struggles within her belly had felt...wonderful. She felt no regret at having eaten the human alive: after all, he had chosen to defy her and sealed his fate.

"Such a shame...he was so friendly, too." She mused, then shrugged. Maybe she'd find another, more obediant human sometime.

She started to get up when her stomach gurgled. She winced, coughed, then let out a burp that embarrassed her even though she was alone. Tricia was about to shrug it off when she noticed something on her mat. Had she burped something up?

Squinting, Tricia peered down at the small, white object...and snorted. It was the tiny acid-bleached skull of the human she ate.
"Hmph. Well that's rather macabre," she mumbled.

She casually stomped the thing into powder, then blew it away with a puff of breath--and like that, there was no sign the human who'd been her guest, and then her meal, had ever existed.

Tricia went about her day, and never gave the human a second thought.
121212121122221.title: Dino Food

choices: Oh I know, I can keep you inside my belly so I will alway be full
Oh I know, I will made you become my baby, i think you be cute as female
121212121122222.content:
But after 2 hours, you somehow survive from be digestion in tricia stomach. “ TRICIA PLEASE LET ME OUT OF YOUR STOMACH!” You yelled.

Tricia slowly awake up from her sleep when she felt you move within her stomach and heard you mumble too. “Well good morning to you, my darling, it seem you survive within my belly yesterday but now what should I do?” She said.
121212121122222.title: You Somehow Survive Digestion

choices: She sits on you for an hour
She gets up after a few minutes
1212121211232.content:
Tricia’s footsteps thunder behind you, making the ground shake as you bound across the floor. You had no idea where you would flee to—outside, in a world where everything was giant? What would you do then?--but you had to get away. You weren’t going to be a giant triceratops’ pet for the rest of your life. A shadow covers you, and you risk a look back.

Tricia looked like a living mountain. A massive, scaly behemoth baring down on you like a force of nature; a predator stalking her prey…

No. That wasn’t it. The triceratops looked amused, almost giddy as she slowly stalked after you. Very slowly; at her size she could have caught up and caught you easily…but she was toying with you; moving at a snail’s pace on purpose to make the chase last longer.

“I admire your spirit, but not your brains,” she teases. “It’s for the best if you submit. I promise to be a fair mistress.” She took a whole hearted step forward—and put a foot down just behind you.

WHAM! the sound was like a bag full of bricks hitting the ground, and shook the earth beneath you; enough to make you miss a step and slow down for a second.

That was all Tricia needed. You hear her giggle again, and then feel a large impact across your back—she must have tapped you with a foot. Yelping, you tumble and fall on your face, rolling across the floor before stopping on your back, staring up at the thatched roof.

Tricia’s massive, smirking face suddenly fills your view. “That was not smart,” she chirps, having enjoyed the little chase. “Fun as that was, I wasn’t bluffing when I said I don’t take kindly to defiant pets. I fear I must punish you.”

Giggling, she raises a foot over you. You cringe in terror—
And the foot comes down harmlessly nearby, as she walks over you.

“Wha…?” You blurt out, stunned.

Tricia giggles again, all four feet missing you. She looks back at you, a glimmer in her eyes. “Oh, I’m not going to STEP on you, little one.”

Realization hits, and you barely have time to shout before she folds her legs and sits on you, her rump crashing down like a boulder. Pressure and Pain are your world as darkness falls.

“Mmm…this should teach you a lesson. It feels quite nice, having you under me,” Tricia purrs, wiggling her rear on you for good measure.

How long would you be trapped under her behind?

121212122.content:

1512.content:
“Well you ain’t you just the cutest thing to ever grace this side o’ the jungle?”

You froze in place, looking up at the huge, hulking reptile just a few feet in front of you. The beast was about 12 feet tall, her head almost poking over the trees. Her scaly body looked completely smooth, like a shark’s, and most of her body was pastel brown, with her underbelly being a slightly lighter hue. Her form was thick and curvaceous from all her previous meals, with most of the weight going to her big, round potbelly, which swung to and fro beneath her as she walked. Her eyes were huge and glowed like gold, and were surprising beautiful for such a creature, with pure black scales above them that strangely resembled feminine eyelashes. The most notable quality of the creature, though, was her booming, human-like voice, which echoed through the jungle every time she spoke.

After a few moments of silence, you screamed so loudly that birds were startled in the distance. You couldn’t help it; you were staring face to face with a t-rex. After watching jurassic park, you could only see creatures like her as mindless killing machines; the perfect predators, capable of tearing a man in half with a single bite. However, the t-rex before you only seemed startled by your terror, blushing in embarrassment. “Whoa! No need to be scared. I ain’t hostile or nothin',” she said. In an attempt to calm you, she lied down on her belly, so that the two of you were about eye-level; a classic show of non-hostility among animals. Now that she wasn’t towering over you anymore, you actually managed to calm down somewhat, catching your breath. “See? Not a threat. Sorry if I scared ya.”

“Y-you can… talk?” You gasped inbetween breaths, slowly backing away from the reptile. You were calming down somewhat, but you still didn’t like being too close to that maw of hers, nor did you like the smell of her meaty breath blowing against your face every time she exhaled.

“Well, that’s an odd question, sugar. Better question is, who can’t talk?” She giggles, still lying there, laying her head against the floor of the jungle. “I mean, you’re flappin’ your gums right now, so it can’t be too hard…”

Soon, you’ve returned to your senses. If the t-rex could talk, that must mean she has human-level intellect and social ability. If that was the case, there was no reason to believe she was just a mindless predator. She seemed downright civil at the moment, in fact. Of course, you were still panicked by how impossible this situation was — dinosaurs were supposed to be extinct, after all, and they definitely weren’t supposed to talk — but you figure those sorts of questions could wait until later. For now, you just focused on ensuring this reptile lady won’t get angry and decide to devour you alive. “W-well… I guess I don’t really know much, but I never thought a tyrannosaurus rex would-”

“A tyranno-what?” She interrupted, raising a brow incredulously.

You shuddered, worried that you’d offended her somehow… but it seemed she was just curious. With a nervous cough, you replied. “I-it’s the term for… y-your species.”

“Huh. That’s a ten-dollar word if I ever heard one. I ain’t never been called a whatchamacallit rex before,” she noted, rubbing her chin with a claw contemplatively.

“What are you called, then?” You asked.

“Well, you can call me Ivy. Pleased to make your acquaintance,” she smiled — a smile which, you shuddered to notice, inadvertently showed off her huge teeth. Now that you were slightly more comfortable around her, she lifted her head, then she remained lying down. “Now, it’s only fair you tell me; what do they call you?”

“M-me?” You responded nervously. “I’m just… a human. My name is Scott. Virgil Scott.”

“Hmm… you really must not be from around here, huh? I’ve never seen anythin’ like ya,” she said, looking down on you curiously, as if sizing you up.

“Yeah, you don’t know the half of it…” You sigh. “I’ve never really seen anything like you, either, though I knew a bit about your species.”

“Oh, really, now?” She smiled, amused by your seeming wealth of knowledge. “Care to tell me some of it? Maybe I can fill in some gaps in your knowledge.”

“Well, I… know you’re a carnivore,” you say nervously, just to see how she responds.

“Hah! Well, that much is obvious!” She said, and you got a chilling view of her maw as she let out a big, hearty laugh. You shuddered when you remembered the rumors that t-rexes were capable of swallowing a man whole. “Tell me something I don’t know!”

“Well, to be honest, I guess I didn’t know as much as I thought,” you said, hoping she’d have mercy on you if you could make her laugh. “For example, us humans thought… thought a t-rex would have feathers,”

“Pfft hahaha! Feathers? Do I look like a bird to you?” She let out an even bigger laugh than the first time, and it took her a while to cool down. She seemed more amused than ever, her huge tail wagging behind her as she prodded you for questions. “Guess ya don’t know as much as I thought... but you seem like the curious sort. Why don’t you ask me some questions?”

There was only one question on your mind, but you weren’t courageous enough to actually ask it before now. You didn’t even want to ask it now, but you figured you needed to know the answer. You sighed, clenching your eyes shut, slowly gathering your courage. “Uh… are you…” You slowly manage to choke out. “... p-planning on… e-eating me?”

A saddened frown emerged on the reptile’s face. You gasped in surprise as she leaned down, nuzzling your body with her snout, only to realize she was trying to console you. Her snout was… actually surprisingly soft and pillowy. Perhaps that was the result of all her extra weight? “Oh, sugar, no. You’re probably the coolest, cutest critter I’ve seen ‘round these parts. I wouldn’t hurt a hair on your body,” she reassures you. “Besides, us big gals usually go for more filling meals. No offense, ‘Scott’, but, uh… you don’t look like you’ve got much meat on your bones. Hehe!”

“Ha… ha…” You nervously fake a laugh as she pulled away, looking down on you once again.

“So… what’re ya travelling through the jungle for?” She asks. “Since you’re out here all on your lonesome, I figure you’re not planning on settlin’ down.”

“Actually, I’m… sort of lost,” you admit sheepishly. “I really don’t have a place to stay.”

“Oh, dear. You know there are raptor packs living all throughout these parts, right? If you don’t know where you’re going, you might waltz right into one of ‘em,” she frowns. “A grisly fate, that is. I wouldn’t want you getting hurt. Hmmm…” She stares at the ground, furrowing her brow as if pondering something. Eventually, she comes to a conclusion. “Tell ya what. I’ve been pretty lonely lately. Why don’t you stick with me? I can keep you super safe.” She smiles. “After all, nobody is going to want to mess with a… t-rex, was it? T-rex… I actually quite like that name. It’s fitting...”

“Wait, s-so… what are you saying?” You ask. “You want me to be your travelling companion?”

“I’m just offerin’ to protect ya, sugar. Let ya ride around on my back, teach ya how to survive out here, the works,” she offers, “but if you don’t trust me, that’s okay. It’s your choice. I ain’t gonna force ya.”

“Is there a… catch?” You ask, tentatively.

“Well, y’know, I might ask you to do a few favors every once in awhile,” she grins. “My arms are pretty tiny, as you can see, so I might need ya to help me bathe, or collect food, or even give me a nice bellyrub every once in awhile. Y’know, the usual.” She shrugs. “But… really, I just want to have somebody to talk to. And you seem like a fun lil’ fella, so… I’d like to hang out more. What do ya say?”

Well, that didn't sound so bad. You silently stare at the ground, considering it. On one hand, you wanted to get away from the t-rex asap. The more time you spent around her, the more likely it is she’ll get hungry and decide you look like an easy snack. Then again, you weren’t sure you’d fare much better out here on your own, either. If what she’s saying was true, and the t-rex really would protect and shelter you… that might be the best chance you were ever going to have of surviving out here.
